price: Biz bunu sizə bir ibrət olsun və yadda saxlayan qulaqlar onu yadda saxlasın deyə (belə) etdik.
arabic: لِنَجۡعَلَهَا لَكُمۡ تَذۡكِرَةٗ وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٞ وَٰعِيَةٞ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: linajʿalahā lakum tadhkiratan wataʿiyahā udhunun wāʿiyatun
translations: and would be conscious of it
